title: 1.13 MONEY RECEIVED CREDITED TO HIGHWAY FUND.
text: Any payment so received for the granting of an easement shall be deposited in the trunk highway fund.

variables.name: payment_type
variables.description: The type of payment received, e.g., easement, lease, etc.

variables.name: deposit_to_trunk_highway_fund
variables.description: Boolean indicating if the payment is deposited in the trunk highway fund

consequences: Deposit the payment in the trunk highway fund
